STATUS_VERIFIED_OK: All verification checks have passed. This version's hash and proof are intact and verified.

STATUS_VERIFIED_FAIL: Some or all verification checks failed. This version's hash and proof are not intact. Evidence that the record has been tampered-with.

STATUS_UNVERIFIED: This version is unverified. If this state persists, something is not working correctly. Please consult your developer.

STATUS_PENDING: This version's confirmation is currently pending. If it's been more than two hours since publication, try again.

STATUS_INITIAL: This version's confirmation is currently awaiting processing. If it's been more than two hours since publication, please check the automated update job. Consult your developer.

STATUS_UPSTREAM_ERROR: The verification process has encountered a network error. Try again in a moment.

STATUS_LOCAL_PROOF_NONE: No local proof was found for this version. If this is the first version, you can safely ignore this message. Otherwise, this is evidence that this version has been tampered-with.

STATUS_LOCAL_HASH_INVALID: A mismatch exists between the stored hash for this version, and the source-data the hash was generated from. Evidence that the record has been tampered-with.

STATUS_LOCAL_COMPONENT_INVALID: One or more components of the local proof were found to be invalid. Evidence that the record has been tampered-with.
